title: Highest Net Investment in Nonfinancial Assets
description: In 2016, Timor-Leste had the highest net investment in nonfinancial assets, accounting for 40.29% of its GDP.

title: Highest Natural Resources Depletion
description: In 2021, Timor-Leste had the highest adjusted savings from natural resources depletion, which was 57.30% of its GNI.

title: Lowest Export Growth
description: In 2023, Timor-Leste experienced the lowest growth in exports of goods and services, with a decline of 59.99%.

title: Lowest Industry Growth
description: In 2023, the industry sector in Timor-Leste, including construction, saw the lowest growth with a decrease of 56.97%.

title: Lowest Adjusted Net National Income Growth
description: In 2021, Timor-Leste had the lowest growth in adjusted net national income, with a decrease of 65.66%.

title: Lowest Inflation Rate
description: In 2023, Timor-Leste had the lowest inflation rate, with the GDP deflator showing a decrease of 20.83%.
